pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Access, organize and share your photos on GNOME. A simple and elegant replacement for using a file manager to deal with photos. Enhance, crop and edit in a snap. Seamless cloud integration is offered through GNOME Online Accounts.
You can: - Automatically find all your pictures - View recent local and online photos - Access your Facebook or Flickr pictures - View photos on TVs, laptops or other DLNA renderers on your local network - Set pictures as your desktop background - Print photos - Select favorites - Easily edit your pictures in the app, or send to a full featured editor for more advanced changes
